content.rendered:
Directed by Rahi Anil Barve. Anand Gandhi. Adesh Prasad

Written by Mitesh Shah. Adesh Prasad. Rahi Anil Barve. Anand Gandhi. Narayan Dharap

Cast Sohum Shah (Vinayak Rao). Jyoti Malshe (Vinayak’s Mother). Anita Date-Kelkar (Vaidehi – Vinayak’s Wife (as Anita Date)). Ronjini Chakraborty (Vinayak’s Mistress). Deepak Damle (Raghav) . Cameron Anderson (Sgt Cooper). Rachit Jadoun (Kishor). Dhundiraj Prabhakar Jogalekar (Young Vinayak). Madhav Hari Joshi (Sarkaar). Harsh K.(Hastar). Piyush Kaushik (Grandmother). Harish Khanna (Raja – Samsthanik). Anika Radhakrishnan (Twin). Arohi Radhakrishnan (Twin). Mohammad Samad (Pandurang (as Mohd Samad)). Rudra Soni (Sadashiv)

Language Hindi. Marathi

Producers Paolo Bertolin. Ruchi Bhimani. Tomas Eskilsson. Anand Gandhi. Mrunalini Havaldar. Sanyukta Kaza. Harini Lakshminarayan. Anthony Muir. Girish Patel. Adesh Prasad. Aanand L. Rai. Amita Shah. Mitesh Shah. Mukesh Shah. Sohum Shah. Sean Wheelan

Production Colour Yellow Production. Sohum Shah FIlm. Film i Väs
